name: 汪建民
objective:
介紹能源材料相關的電性質、光學性質、及磁性質，包括 1.晶體化學和結晶學 2.材料的能帶結構和電性 4.太陽能電池 5.材料的光電效應和LED 6.材料的磁性、霍爾效應和磁記錄
Overall highlighting the electrical, optoelectronic, and magnetic properties of energy-related materials and including the following topics: 1.Crystal chemistry and crystallography; 2.Quantum mechanics and electronic properties; 3.Semiconductors and p-n junction physics; 4.Solar electricity; 5. Optoelectronic Effects - efficiency and LED; 6.Magnetic properties and Hall effect.
schedule:
Chapter I: Renewable Energy & Solar Potential
      (再生能源與太陽能之展望)
Chapter II: Crystal Chemistry and Crystallography
      (晶體化學和結晶學)
Chapter III: Electric Property--Semiconductor and Solar Cell 
      (材料電性和太陽能電池)
Chapter VI: Optoelctronic Effects--Light-Emitting Diodes 
      (材料光電性和LED, 發光二極體)
Chapter V: Magnetic Property--Nano-bits Media for Tera-world
      (材料磁性和磁記錄中的奈米世界)
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term Exam (期中考) 25%，　　　　　　　　
Term Paper (期末報告) 35%，

materials:

2.“Solid State Electronic Devices”, Ben G. Streetman and Stanjay Banerjee, 6th Ed., Prentice Hall, Inc., USA (2006).
